channel.title: Domain-Driven Design on VMware Tanzu - Developer Advocates
channel.description: Recent content in Domain-Driven Design on VMware Tanzu - Developer Advocates

item.title: Jakub Pilimon
item.description: Jakub is a Developer Advocate at VMware, blogger, programmer, and trainer. He loves to tackle complex enterprises with Domain-Driven Design, Test-Driven Development and Spring. Architecture is a main area of interest, too. When he doesn’t program, he rides motorbikes, skis or practices kitesurfing. He writes a DZone MVB awarded blog and his pet projects can be found at https://github.com/ddd-by-examples.
